name: Adaptation (PinkLeafSheep)
description:
I made this for Kaiju jam 2 as my first jam, i had to rush some parts but overall for a first attempt at a jam i'm happy:)

Manage your limited funds to prevent the approaching Kaiju from destroying your city. Once you knock it down it will be fully restored and resistant to whatever you used to take it down, so adapt to it's adaptation to see how many days you can survive.

tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/pinkleafsheep

the song playing is Rock around the clock 5 by soundtrack 4 life, taken from free music archive.
